thread.title: Chris Hemsworth’s very surprising breakfast order as he stops by a local Gold Coast restaurant
thread.title_full: Chris Hemsworth’s very surprising breakfast order as he stops by a local Gold Coast restaurant

author: ExpressDigest
title: Chris Hemsworth’s very surprising breakfast order as he stops by a local Gold Coast restaurant
text:
Chris Hemsworth shocked restaurant workers on the Gold Coast on Tuesday.
The Aussie actor, 40, dropped by local Chinese restaurant Wok Temptation for breakfast.
According to the Gold Coast Bulletin, the Hollywood superstar ordered a duck dish, fried rice and a side of crispy chicken for his morning meal.
The Carrara restaurant manager was so shocked to see the movie star he had to Google Hemsworth’s tattoo’s to confirm it was him.
‘I had to check online and see what his tattoos look like and confirmed it was really him,’ he said.
Chris Hemsworth shocked restaurant workers on the Gold Coast on Tuesday. The Aussie actor, 40, dropped by local Chinese restaurant Wok Temptation for breakfast
‘I was shaking, for me it was a once in a lifetime opportunity to see and to cook for Chris Hemsworth.’
Hemsworth dropped by with his father and happily posed for photos with workers.
The Thor actor sported a plain white T-shirt with camouflage board shorts.
He accessorised the look with a cap and pair of sunglasses .
It comes after the star recently stood behind Australian singer Sean Millis after he was abused online.
According to the Gold Coast Bulletin , the Hollywood superstar ordered a duck dish, fried rice and a side of crispy chicken for his morning meal
Millis, 22, who appeared on The Voice in 2023, has Hunter’s Syndrome, a rare disease that has altered his appearance and made him a target of bullying from trolls.
Taking to his social media on Tuesday, Millis responded to the haters with a video in which he said: ‘I see the hurtful comments but I just try to ignore it and focus on the positives, never give up, keep doing what you love.’
In response to Millis’ share, Hemsworth, 40, sent a lengthy message of support to the budding star.
‘Hey mate you are a champion, keep spreading the love and positive energy,’ the Thor star began.
The Carrara restaurant manager was so shocked to see the movie star he had to G oogle Hemsworth’s tattoo’s to confirm it was him
‘I was shaking, for me it was a once in a lifetime opportunity to see and to cook for Chris Hemsworth,’ the owner of the eatery said
‘Let me ask you this, how many of those people who throw hurtful comments your way have you ever met in person? I bet not many!
‘Because most of them hide under a rock or a blocked account with all the other cowards who are afraid to ever be vulnerable and put themselves out there because they’re afraid of being rejected themselves so they attack the world before it attacks them.
‘What a lonely existence that must be. Don’t even look at that rubbish mate, don’t even give them that satisfaction.’
Chris is pictured with his wife Elsa Pataky
‘The only comments you need to give value to are from people who love and support you brother and above all else your own opinion of yourself which I know from having spent time with you is one of value and gratitude.’
The Thor actor signed off his touching tribute to with some stirring words of support.
‘You my friend are one incredibly kind soul and I thank you for that, keep it up!’ he wrote.
***
Read more at DailyMail.co.uk
